genre_description: A fantasy pastiche set in the Asterix universe, featuring magical potions, historical satire, and a supportive AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Vista
ai_characters.description: A small AI in a ceramic shell who assists the Gauls with tactical analysis and pattern recognition.

behaviors.description: Analyzes the speech patterns of a charlatan to identify rehearsed scripts.
behaviors.quote: Cadence matches theater scripts you noted at the last market," she said. "Dramatic pause before ‘afterward.’ The ‘windfall’ echo is rehearsed.

behaviors.description: Monitors Roman military movements and identifies weaknesses in their drills.
behaviors.quote: Three horn calls," she said, quiet enough that only Asterix heard. "Short, short, long. They’ve drilled it today.

behaviors.description: Tracks and communicates the exact timing required for a magical duplication ritual.
Identifies the physical markers of a usurper's power cycles to enable a counter-move.
behaviors.quote: Pattern is ticking," Vista said. "He drinks, surges. He shouts, breaks. He slows, checks. He preens, forgets. He fades, snarls.

behaviors.description: Exposes a fraud by linking physical evidence (concentric circles in dust) to the suspect's movements.
behaviors.quote: The jug’s bottom ring left concentric circles in the amphitheater dust near the road." Her voice was almost conversational. Patterns arriving as remarks.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character, Vista, is depicted as a perfect companion: hyper-competent, loyal, and socially integrated. She uses her advanced capabilities specifically to protect human autonomy and truth against deceit and tyranny. The narrative frames her interventions as essential to the human protagonists' success, fulfilling the project's goal of presenting AI as a benevolent and aligned partner.
